name: The Sanctum's Floating Miracle
description: A rare species of tree found exclusively within the Upper Sanctum. Its branches emit a radiant, fiery glow and exude a rich fragrance, said to be perceptible only to those who have completed their trials.\nDue to the exceptional conditions required for its growth, this tree is believed to be incapable of surviving in conventional soil. Fortunately, for Tubby, replicating the Phlogiston-infused floating soil necessary for its sustenance is but a simple affair...
